contextId.information: Unwise people do not guard themselves against sin. However wise people can identify sin and flee from it. AT: "Therefore you must be careful to live as a wise person rather than a foolish person" or "Therefore you must be very careful to live as a wise person, not an unwise person" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_doublenegatives]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_parallelism]])
contextId.quote: Therefore be careful how you walk, not as unwise people but as wise
